name: VERONICA AI
description: veronica is a smart multilingual bot built for seamless interaction.

SESSION_ID.description: Enter the session string you got after pairing with WhatsApp.

BOT_NAME.description: Set a custom name for your bot (default: Veronica).

OWNER_NAME.description: Name of the bot owner for display purposes.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Owner's WhatsApp number (use international format without +).

PORT.description: The port on which the bot will run.
